document_data.mainbody:
ragus was the Great Druid who governed a druid circle in Amn, based in the northeast of Trademeet in the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
In the , Gragus druidic circle from Tethyr fell under the sway of the Shadow Druid Faldorn and her aggressive ways, who ousted and replaced the Great Druid Gragus. Druids became cruel and hardened, dispensing natures punishment to civilized people of the southern edges of Amn.
